body: So yeah in this one the husband seems to be a major idiot that got cucked and NTR'd on his own and didn't even realize until he was relegated to being someone who pretty much just takes care of the other guys kids while he impregnates the dudes wife over and over he also seems to have accepted and be happy with it since it makes his wife happy even though the whole thing seems to have started because he didn't like the awkward sex and the wife wanted to make him happy which the ex-boyfriend exploited.

Well not sure if I got this one right or not but pretty much wifes ex-boyfriend turned her into a slut and even a bit scared of sex. She get's a new boyfriend who she marries but their sexual life is awkward as hell so to fix it husband goes to the source, the ex-boyfriend. Then somehow the ex-boyfriend convinces the husband that they have to do a no sex life so that she can slowly get used to sex again. In turn it seems the ex-boyfriend manages to convince the wife that her husband has a major NTR-fetish then he starts fucking and impregnating her. Eventually wife comes clean asking if he still wants to be her husband and father to the children and he say's yes and accepts that his wife is a slut? Then ending is pretty much they've gotten even more kids and the ex-boyfriend while fucking the wife tells her she has to work hard to please him so to make her husband happy.
